attributes.action: Government review/enquiry on how Blackpool Council waste Public Funds.
attributes.additional_details:
1, Daily over spending of public funds.
2, No interest in local people and there opinions.
3, Giving contract work to out of town companies rather than using local people, companies.
This has gone on for too long and these issues need to be addressed. The government has the power to view and make enquiries into public spending of local councils, and if on finding evidence of over spending public funds to make amends.
